import useReveal from '../hooks/useReveal'; export default function Home({ setPage }) { const [servicesRef, servicesVisible] = useReveal(); const [philosophyRef, philosophyVisible] = useReveal(); const [teamRef, teamVisible] = useReveal(); return (
{/* HERO */}

Archonik Consulting

Helping Studios Build,
Launch and Scale Great Games.

We provide production, publishing, and strategy expertise for teams who want to ship smarter.

{/* KEY SERVICES OVERVIEW */}

How We Can Help

What We Can Do

setPage('services')}>

Production Support

setPage('services')}>

Certification and Launch Readiness

setPage('services')}>

Engineering Support

setPage('services')}>

Creative and Narrative Counseling

setPage('services')}>

Strategic Planning and Advice

These direct to the Services Page hyperlinked down to the correct section.

{/* OUR PHILOSOPHY */}

Our Philosophy

We believe that development teams should have access to expert publishing services and resources without needing to sign up for a long term agreement.

With decades of experience publishing and shipping games, our group aims to provide a flexible set of services that can be customized to fit your studio and game needs.

You only pay for what you need.

{/* MEET OUR TEAM */}

Meet Our Team
